faq.title: Common questions about the AVIF converter

items.question: Does using the online AVIF converter upload or store my images?
items.answer: No. All processing stays inside your browser and our servers never see your files.

items.question: Do I need to register to use this free AVIF converter?
items.answer: Not at all. There's no signup, no email requirement, and no usage limits.

items.question: Can I run the AVIF converter offline?
items.answer: After the initial load, you can keep converting and downloading even if the connection drops.

items.question: Is it safe to use the AVIF converter on public Wi-Fi?
items.answer: Yes, because files never leave your device. Still, we recommend using trusted hardware and closing the tab when finished.

items.question: Does GA4 capture my image content?
items.answer: No. GA4 only records anonymous events (e.g., conversion success/failure, download ZIP). Use incognito mode if you want to reduce tracking further.
